message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand it's a bit above your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $105.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $105 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go to $95. It's a fair price for both of us, and I'm sure we can close this deal.
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell the product to you for $102.50. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
